programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifter deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.desc: A busker met a girl who makes decision through tossing a coin.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Scooch is selected to present a cake on the hit show, Whatever it Cakes, Tag agrees to drive him to the studio in Chew York City. But getting there will be harder than they imagined. / Lady Lydia is hosting Haturday for her family this year but she can’t seem to find the feathers on her Haturday hat. Tag will help retrace her steps and Scooch will take care of the guests while they search.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes’ famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tag’s ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.desc: Oh is stuck in an alternate universe; Oh's new ranking as most respected Boov Rapper in Chicago is threatened

programme.desc: Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: With the mighty Dreadtrux threatening to destroy the crater, Ty considers working with D-Structs to save both of their homes.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: The animals are exploring what noises each of their houses make… whose house do we think is the noisiest in the whole of the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: After disobeying orders, Snotlout is expelled from the academy. Meanwhile, Alvin comes to Berk to make amends- but can he be trusted?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2

programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Scooch is selected to present a cake on the hit show, Whatever it Cakes, Tag agrees to drive him to the studio in Chew York City. But getting there will be harder than they imagined. / Lady Lydia is hosting Haturday for her family this year but she can’t seem to find the feathers on her Haturday hat. Tag will help retrace her steps and Scooch will take care of the guests while they search.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes’ famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.desc: Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each other’s point of view. /When Branch decides it’s time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tag’s ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.desc: Oh is stuck in an alternate universe; Oh's new ranking as most respected Boov Rapper in Chicago is threatened

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: With the mighty Dreadtrux threatening to destroy the crater, Ty considers working with D-Structs to save both of their homes.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: The animals are exploring what noises each of their houses make… whose house do we think is the noisiest in the whole of the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: After disobeying orders, Snotlout is expelled from the academy. Meanwhile, Alvin comes to Berk to make amends- but can he be trusted?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: "Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!!" Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
programme.desc: Ik Hyeon is a corrupt customs officer involved in drug dealings and hooks up with mob boss Hyeong Bae to sell drugs. Together they expand the mob business with their own connections and strengths, but when the government declares a war on crime, the two partners get entangled in a web of conspiracy and betrayal.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Carolina and Dion’s relationship is in rocky water, with Carolina distracted by former contestant Dan.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Julie and Andreas purchased their first home on the fly, needing to get out of their cramped apartment as soon as they could. Now, two years and two kids later, the family is all over each other.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: At the age of 50, Stacy Krieg was reborn! Taking life head on, Stacy's divorce prompted this Jersey girl to move out west. Now, with all her children grown, Stacy is once again at a crossroads.

programme.title: Secret Love Triangle
programme.desc: After being falsely charged with murdering her best friend's husband, Jessica goes on the run with her husband. To prove her innocence, she must first untangle a deadly web of lust and deceit.

programme.title: The Disappearance Of Cari Farver
programme.desc: Dave finds himself on the receiving end of twisted messages from girlfriend Cari, who abruptly disappears. As Cari's mother continues to search for her daughter, police finally make a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Abducted At An HBCU: A Black Girl Missing Movie
programme.desc: When ambitious college student Shannon disappears due to financial struggles, her counselor Ellen discovers a trafficking ring targeting students like her and must fight to rescue Shannon.

programme.title: Triple Digit Flip (S2)
programme.desc: Jamil, Pace, and Rahima have to choose between a tiny house with almost no opportunity for ROI or a Frankenhouse, which has a ton of space but a horrifying layout.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: America's diverse culture is reflected in our food and in our love to mash it up to create delicious dishes. These creative fusions take our favourite foods and combine them with international flavours.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: Airline Wars
programme.desc: Utter chaos erupts when a man goes on the attack while waiting in the security line. A pilot is arrested for attempting to operate an aircraft while under the influence.

programme.desc: Buddy makes a cake for an old friend and the current Editorial Director of House Beautiful Magazine, Joanna Saltz. When Danny "The Mule" announces his retirement, Buddy and the gang throw a surprise party.

programme.title: Ang Pambansang Third Wheel
programme.desc: Trina has lived her whole life as a third wheel. Will Trina ever break free from being a third or fourth wheel and finally find happiness as the Only One?

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Manila's Finest
programme.desc: Manila's Finest is inspired and based on the life and career of retired Western Police District (WPD) Col. Jimmy Tiu, who last served as the Sta. Mesa police station commander of WPD.

programme.title: 100 Tula Para Kay Stella
programme.desc: Throughout his four years in college, Fidel, a stuttering student, tries to finish 100 poems dedicated to Stella, an aspiring but frustrated rock star, to win her heart.

programme.title: Itutumba Ka ng Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Teteng (Janno Gibbs), a single father and assistant to a film director, faces his last days due to a brain tumor. Despite his fear of confrontation, he becomes determined to protect his daughter from bullies.

programme.title: Abay Babes
programme.desc: It tells the story of five girls who have been best friends since high school and are reunited for a wedding of the least attractive person in their group.

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Walang Pakiramdam
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a rare congenital disease that makes her incapable of feeling physical and emotional pain meets a man with cleft palate who makes her feel love like she never has before.

programme.title: It Takes A Man And A Woman
programme.desc: Miggy and Laida try to co-exist in the same company while Laida tries to oppose Miggy's business decisions through a series of events which made them realize the real definition of true love.

programme.title: Ang Manananggal sa Unit 23B
programme.desc: Jewel is a mysterious woman who lives alone in the city. She has a secret which has led her to settle into a lonely existence. That is, until she meets Nico, a broken-hearted, down-and-out guy who also feels unlovable like she does.

programme.title: Nilalang
programme.desc: Nilalang tackles the underbelly of corrupt Philippine cops with the Japanese 'Yakuza' and its links to a centuries' old curse that may be responsible for the spate of serial killings happening in Manila.

programme.title: Sugat Sa Puri
programme.desc: He has been a good man all his life. A dutiful son, a loving brother, a considerate friend. But one day, armed thugs barged into his quiet life and murder his family.

programme.title: The Wife
programme.desc: A couple's marriage gets tainted as the husband cheats. How can the wife take her husband's dying plea to be with her and his mistress at the remaining days of his life?

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaisa (Alice Dixson) is a Filipino widow who lives in Nuuk with her rebellious adult son Karl. She meets a visiting Filipino seaman Mark (Aga Muhlach). He is friendly and caring. But a blizzard is threatening to cause more havoc in her life.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane

programme.title: CSI S4 E06 - Jackpot
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.desc: Alton Brown "reloads" this show from 2003, creating a more flavorful, faster stock and then turning that into a chicken soup.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Meteor impacts have altered our world, creating the perfect environment for the rise of humankind. But could new evidence reveal that celestial objects have been directed to Earth by an alien intelligence?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: After the team conducts a simultaneous drone swarm experiment in order to stimulate phenomena on Skinwalker Ranch, they encounter more than what they bargained for.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: Relics from the crucifixion of Jesus Christ have fascinated the faithful for 2000 years—from the wooden cross and iron nails to the crown of thorns. But do these sacred artefacts still exist?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, many have sought the lost Ark of the Covenant. According to the Old Testament, God himself instructed Moses to build the Ark, and it is believed that it held the power of the Almighty.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While the team searches for clues to understand why an ancient well was constructed on Lot 26, excitement abounds when more evidence of a tunnel heading directly towards the garden shaft is discovered.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrell Miklos and his team make a discovery far older than they expected. Later, new evidence emerges suggesting that the team may have uncovered a long-lost battle at Target 4.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: After the team conducts a simultaneous drone swarm experiment in order to stimulate phenomena on Skinwalker Ranch, they encounter more than what they bargained for.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, many have sought the lost Ark of the Covenant. According to the Old Testament, God himself instructed Moses to build the Ark, and it is believed that it held the power of the Almighty.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens has met with eyewitnesses and travelled to the sites of incredible UFO incidents reported all over the world. Now, Giorgio Tsoukalos looks back at the most compelling investigations of all.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Meteor impacts have altered our world, creating the perfect environment for the rise of humankind. But could new evidence reveal that celestial objects have been directed to Earth by an alien intelligence?

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: The harsh Labrador environment has a profound effect on the participants' mindset and their strategies, even proving too much for one participant to overcome.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: Between Arctic Winter and hunger setting in, the participants double down on their efforts for survival. Procuring food becomes an urgent necessity after survivalists go days without nourishment.

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3)
programme.desc: The clock is ticking with only days remaining in python season. Pickle seeks validation from Troy on her tracking skills. Bruce must hunt alone in Zak's absence.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Eustace hunts for his winter meat in the pre-dawn hours. Jake harvests a deer with bow and arrow. Tom helps his friend Paul prepare for trapping season. Ray spends a frigid night on the mountain.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: As the Fellowship prepares to get a team member underground in the Money Pit for the first time, a new theory emerges suggesting that Nolan's Cross holds the secret to its exact location.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: A storm is headed for the swamp. Daniel faces the tempest head-on. Ronnie braves dangerous lightning. Ashley tries to outrun the rain while Leron and Porkchop wade right in.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: As a new year of investigations begin on Skinwalker Ranch, members of the team confront a secret that Dr. Travis Taylor has had to keep from them for the past two years.

programme.title: Hawakan Mo At Pigilan Ang Kahapon
programme.desc: Elsa (Liza Lorena) is rushed to the hospital for an undetermined illness. Her doctor/husband Ricardo (Dante Rivero) refuses to operate her, and requests another doctor to take his place.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Darna (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Darna, the most beloved of Filipino superheroes, entered the era of the 90's as a quiet, bespectacled girl reporter. She defended the good against the many evil forces, which were lurking in the big city.

programme.title: Ang Titser Kong Pogi
programme.desc: Joey Perez (Bong Revilla, Jr), a policeman goes to Subic as a Kindergarten teacher to secretly investigate the case where he was framed up. He becomes attached to Cynthia, a co-teacher and Jimbo.

programme.title: Saan Nagtatago Ang Pag-ibig? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A marriage of convenience became a fulfilling relationship that eventually opened the eyes and hearts of everybody into the beautiful soul hidden inside the young man nobody wanted. Starring Vilma Santos, Tonton Gutierrez and Ricky Davao.

programme.title: The Flor Contemplacion Story (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The tragic tale of the Filipino maid hanged for the murder in Singapore in 1995 not only called the attention to the plight of overseas workers everywhere in the world but also resulted in one of the most acclaimed films in Philippine motion picture history.

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: Mga Batang Riles

programme.title: Bala Ko Ang Hahatol
programme.desc: Gino (Robin Padilla) kills Rudy (Rey PJ Abellana) and brings Rudy's wife Cristina (Nina Sara) to his boss. Still not in her right mind, Cristina re-enacts her traumatic experience and kills the man in the process.

programme.title: Sgt. Miguel Carpio: Multiple Murder
programme.desc: An exemplary policeman dedicates so much time to his duties that his wife begins to feel neglected.

programme.title: Bagwis Ng Lawin
programme.desc: Bagwis Ng Lawin

programme.title: Ikaw
programme.desc: The song, Ikaw, is the backdrop of this touching melodrama about a young composer and the love of his life. Sharon played a doctor who always decided using her head while Ariel was a composer who put his heart into everything he did.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
programme.desc: From New York and Hong Kong, the essential stories from the close of the US markets to the open of trading across Asia.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open

programme.desc: Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra’s house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 5
programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In the future, North America is no more. In its place has risen Panem, a divided nation split into 12 districts. Every year, each district selects a teen of each gender (called "Tributes") to test their worth in a competition known as the Hunger Games. Part entertainment, part brutal retribution for a past rebellion, the televised games are broadcast throughout Panem. The 24 participants are forced to eliminate their competitors while the citizens of Panem are required to watch. When her younger sister is selected as District 12's latest "Tribute," Katniss volunteers to take her place, and trains under hard-drinking former Hunger Games champion Haymitch Abernathy to sharpen her killer instincts. Now in order to survive the game and emerge the victor, this young combatant must put all of her skills to the ultimate test.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 107
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Dan Bourchier for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: When a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates, two best friends who'd do anything for each other find themselves in a no-holds-barred, take-no-prisoners struggle that threatens to erupt into all-out war.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Hannah And Her Sisters
programme.desc: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as Chuck Noland, a Federal Express efficiency expert, who is stranded on a remote island after his plane crashes. Forced to survive in isolation, he undertakes a journey of self-discovery that transforms him, both physically and emotionally.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: What do a sexy stewardess, a gun runner, a lonely bail bondsman, a shifty ex-con, a federal agent, and a stoned beach bunny have in common? They're six players on the trail of a half million dollars in the third feature film by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as Chuck Noland, a Federal Express efficiency expert, who is stranded on a remote island after his plane crashes. Forced to survive in isolation, he undertakes a journey of self-discovery that transforms him, both physically and emotionally.

programme.desc: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: What do a sexy stewardess, a gun runner, a lonely bail bondsman, a shifty ex-con, a federal agent, and a stoned beach bunny have in common? They're six players on the trail of a half million dollars in the third feature film by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: (Live) Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: When Titans Clash S8: The Trade War Is Not Over
programme.desc: China is not backing down from a trade war and has vowed to “fight to the end,” with serious implications for the economy of the rest of Asia. Why are they so confident? In this documentary, we compare and contrast 4 key areas of US and China economy, to understand each superpower’s position in the trade war.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: Singapore reports an alarming rise in the number of drug offenders who are young. This documentary revealing the hidden harms, societal consequences, and the ongoing fight to prevent a youth addiction crisis.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Insight

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: Why are millions falling into the dark traps of synthetic drug addiction? Can border security forces and activists fight against the deadly addiction of crystal meth?

programme.desc: Karen Lee is a 20-year veteran of the Singapore Prison Service who was instrumental in transforming prisons with community corrections programmes, inspiring other female wardens such as Koh Zhi Mian.

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: 3AM

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: Murders are rare in tranquil Delta Township. So when a well-liked couple is gunned down in their home, residents are terrified — until police discover the monster accidentally left a trail of breadcrumbs.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Police quickly identify a suspect in the murder of a local college professor, but a bombshell piece of technology stolen from the crime scene then points them in a completely different direction.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A mother, her two children and her best friend mysteriously vanish. Investigators find the family's home covered in blood but very few clues. A minute detail helps authorities track down a suspect.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Curtis Reeves stands accused of murdering Chad Oulson over popcorn at a matinee movie. The defence claims he acted in self-defence—that Oulson was the aggressor.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Kerry Lyn Dalton was sentenced to death for the torture and murder of Irene "Melanie" May. And because Melanie was a meth addict with no fixed address, police did little to investigate her disappearance.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A paranormal investigative team is stunned by an unsettling capture on their thermal imaging camera. A mother and daughter are profoundly moved by a particularly beautiful UFO sighting.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: Maine is brought to its knees when its most popular teen turns up dead. With the help of a dedicated mother and a community that never forgets, the secret killer is finally exposed.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Two young sisters hide in their closet to remain hidden from the men who broke into their house. An accidental leg amputation at an Orlando recycling plant has rescue workers racing to the scene.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: In 2019, Jim's daughter, Elesha, lost her job and needed a place to stay so she moved. Moving in with Jim however, dealing with the hoard has been the most difficult part of her life.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a mother asks the judge to sterilise her murderous daughter; a French tourist is in trouble for writing bad checks.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a TikTok star is on trial for murder; a lawyer gets tasered; a teen mum faces multiple felonies; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Two teens under interrogation turn on each other; a suspect attempts a shocking escape from police custody; a husband and wife must answer for their deadly secret; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A farmer shares a terrible secret about two missing people—and her pigs; a confrontation over a parking space turns deadly; a missing person case takes a dark turn; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: After a former marine is gunned down in broad daylight, Tulsa detectives must track down a family of three. But, at trial, justice hangs on whether the gunman and victim are actually who they appear to be.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When Gwinnett County detectives find a mother stabbed to death, identifying her killer falls to her young son. But testifying at trial could be difficult for the child.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predator's bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S1)
programme.desc: A man unearths his late grandfather's djinn. Next, actress Daphne Iking meets a ghostly old man. Later, a TV crew working in an old house sees strange things.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S1)
programme.desc: A man gets licked by a ghost. Next, Miss Malaysia Soo Wincci's has strange experiences after acting in a horror drama. Later, a murdered jogger returns.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: En Terre Animale
programme.desc: Emotion, sporting challenges and star animals are all on the programme for Franck, Muffin and Praline.

programme.title: Au Pays Du Bonheur
programme.desc: Marc-André discovers Melbourne, one of Australia's most densely-populated cities, and explores urban policy with a researcher from Smart City. He also tests a mindfulness app that helps children cultivate their well-being, and meets people with reduced mobility.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes
programme.desc: We head off to Isère on a vegetable and gourmet tour tasting fresh and summary recipes, which are loyal to the benefits of nature and the region.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: En Terre Animale
programme.desc: Emotion, sporting challenges and star animals are all on the programme for Franck, Muffin and Praline.

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ça
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Api is devastated to learn that she is accused of cheating. Koro still encourages her not to give up on her investigation.

programme.title: Mystery Lane
programme.desc: Clever and Bro, two little hamsters, live in a pet shop. She's the big sister, funny and incredibly intelligent; he's her cute little brother, sometimes grumpy, always brave. In their consulting rooms in the shop's basement, they confront the supernatural as they help London's animals solve some very strange goings-on!

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes
programme.desc: We head off to Isère on a vegetable and gourmet tour tasting fresh and summary recipes, which are loyal to the benefits of nature and the region.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Temps Présent
programme.desc: ''Temps Présent'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres Au Puy-En-Velay
